translation.en: Then I will grab them and place them on your chest.
translation.it: Quindi le prenderei e te le metterei sul petto.

translation.en: And then I will place your hands over them like that.
translation.it: Poi ci metterei sopra le tue mani, così.

translation.en: Something I like to call the Venezuelan embrace.

translation.en: I am him.
-I am the Ghost. -I knew it.
So, what can I do for you?
[El Toro] Mm. You, my friend...
You are going to kill the president of Venezuela.
[El Toro] In two days, our so-called president
translation.it: Fra due giorni, il nostro cosiddetto Presidente

translation.en: will throw himself an inauguration ball to celebrate his fifth unelected term.
translation.it: darà un ballo inaugurale per celebrare il suo quinto mandato non eletto.

translation.en: And there, you will take his life.
And in doing so, you will send a message to the people
translation.it: Con questo, manderai un messaggio al popolo

translation.en: that greed and corruption will not be tolerated.
translation.it: che avidità e corruzione non saranno tollerate.

translation.en: And that the revolution has begun.
translation.it: E che la rivoluzione è iniziata.

translation.en: I understand completely.
It just seems you've got quite a few resources here.
translation.it: Mi sembra che abbiate un bel po' di risorse, qui.

translation.en: Wow, is that a 50 cal-- Yeah, that's a 50 cal.
translation.it: Quello è un calibro 50... Sì, è un 50 cal.

translation.en: Um, why not do it yourself?
translation.it: Perché non lo fate voi stessi?

translation.en: Because not even I could reach the man in his palace.
translation.it: Nemmeno io potrei raggiungere quell'uomo nel suo palazzo.

translation.en: For that, I need someone with your unique talents.
translation.it: Mi occorre qualcuno con il tuo talento unico.

translation.en: Right. First step would be reconnaissance.
translation.it: Giusto. Il primo passo sarebbe la ricognizione.

translation.en: Uh, I would need a vehicle and a map clearly indicating
translation.it: Mi serve un veicolo e una mappa che indichi

translation.en: -where the nearest airport is located. -Whoa, whoa, whoa.
translation.it: dove si trova l'aeroporto più vicino.

translation.en: Why would you need that?
Because once it's done...
um, I'll have less than 90 minutes to leave the country.
translation.it: avrò meno di 90 minuti per abbandonare il paese.

translation.en: Out of the country?
-When it's done. -Ninety minutes.
Okay, you're right. You will need a car.
translation.it: Ok, hai ragione. Ti servirà un'auto.

translation.en: And a driver, my second in command.

translation.en: [El Toro] Psst. Oye, drive him.
Nice to meet you.
You are not the Ghost.
-He is the Ghost, Juan. He's the Ghost. -He's not the Ghost.
translation.it: - Lui è il Fantasma, Juan. - Non è il Fantasma.

translation.en: And when I prove it...
I'm gonna kill him myself.
I must apologize for Juan.
He's a bit of a wet blanket.
Good luck.
[Cleveland] That idiot is dead.
[agent] So incredibly dead.
Voice analysis is back.
Name's Samuel Larson.
He published a book claiming to be, get this... an international assassin.
translation.it: Ha pubblicato un libro dove dice, pensa, di essere un assassino internazionale.

translation.en: We should probably pull him out, put him on a plane home.
translation.it: Forse dovremmo salvarlo, e mandarlo a casa su un aereo.

translation.en: Why the hell would we do that?
Because we're the CIA.
-You almost got me. You almost got me. -You know I like messing with you, man.
translation.it: - Me l'hai quasi fatta. Quasi. - Sai che mi piace prenderti in giro.

translation.en: I didn't know where you were going with that.
translation.it: Non avevo idea a cosa stessi puntando.

translation.en: Bet you a Benji he's dead in less than 48.
translation.it: Scommetto 100 sacchi che è morto in meno di 48 ore.

translation.en: Double he doesn't make it to breakfast.
translation.it: Rilancio del doppio che non arriva a colazione.

translation.en: Yeah.
Come on. From here you do your reconnaissance.
translation.it: Andiamo. Da qui fai la tua ricognizione.

translation.en: So, I guess I should get started. Uh...
So, I will see you in probably a few hours, I guess.
translation.it: Allora, ci rivediamo probabilmente tra qualche ora, direi.

translation.en: Where you go, I follow.
translation.it: Dove vai tu, io ti seguo.

translation.en: Look. We seem to have gotten off on the wrong foot.

translation.en: No, I'm on the right foot. The foot of you are not the Ghost.
translation.it: No, io ho il piede giusto. Il piede che tu non sei il Fantasma.

translation.en: What makes you so sure?
The Ghost would never have been kidnapped so easily.
translation.it: Il Fantasma non si sarebbe fatto rapire così facilmente.

translation.en: That's a fair point. But you know, maybe I wanted to be kidnapped.
translation.it: Valida osservazione. Ma sai, magari volevo farmi davvero rapire.

translation.en: Or maybe you're a fraud. And a liar.
translation.it: O magari sei un impostore. E un bugiardo.

translation.en: And maybe I kill you right now.
translation.it: E magari io ti uccido adesso.

translation.en: So, what is the Ghost gonna do?
That's a good question.
So?
What is the Ghost gonna do?
He's gonna pee. I got to pee.
-Around the corner, to the right. -Gotcha.
Open up.
Open up.
[Juan] Güero, open the door.
Damn.
-[Sam] They're gonna kill the president. -[detective] Who is?
Pro-dem guerrillas. El Toro.
-They tried to hire me. -They tried to hire you?
translation.it: - Hanno provato ad assoldarmi. - Hanno provato ad assoldare te?

translation.en: Yeah, but not the real me.
translation.it: Sì, ma non il vero me.

translation.en: The fake me from my book, True Memoirs of an International Assassin.
translation.it: Il me fasullo dal mio libro, Autobiografia di un assassino.

translation.en: If that is the fake you, then why does it say "true" in the title?
translation.it: Se si tratta del te fasullo, perché il titolo dice "autobiografia"?

translation.en: -It's just to sell more books. -So, can you show me a copy?
translation.it: - È per vendere più libri. - Puoi mostrarmene una copia?

translation.en: [stammers] You got a computer?
-The computer's not working today. -You don't have one working computer?
translation.it: - Il computer oggi non funziona. - Non avete un computer operativo?

translation.en: -You don't have one copy of your book? -It's a virtual book.
translation.it: - Non hai una copia del libro? - È un libro virtuale.

translation.en: -Ah, then it's not a real book. -No, it's real. It's real, okay?
translation.it: - Allora non è un libro reale. - No, è reale, ok?

translation.en: It's just online.
It could be the next-- Do you know Twilight?
-Oh, I know Twilight. -It could be the next Twilight...
translation.it: - Conosco Twilight. - Potrebbe essere il nuovo Twilight.

translation.en: [inhales sharply] Can you just take me to the embassy?
This doesn't look like the embassy.
It's not the real embassy, no.
translation.it: Non è la vera ambasciata, no.

translation.en: [detective] You sit here.
-Make yourself comfortable. -[officer in Spanish] I'm calling him.
He says El Toro hired him to kill the president.

translation.en: [in English] We--? We gonna be here long?
[in Spanish] Masovich wants to see him at his house in half an hour.
translation.it: Masovich vuole vederlo a casa sua tra mezzora.

translation.en: [in Spanish] He doesn't pay me well enough to be at his beck and call.

translation.en: [officer] You want to tell him that?
We'll take him to Masovich.
But not before this gringo gives me a much-deserved bonus.
translation.it: Ma non prima che questo gringo non mi dia un meritato bonus.

translation.en: [in English] Okay.
You need to get me some money.

translation.en: Some next-Twilight-sized money.
translation.it: Soldi del calibro del prossimo Twilight.

translation.en: -Yello. -[Sam over phone] Kylie. Hi, it's Sam.
Ghost with the most. What's the word?
translation.it: Il fantasma del marasma. Come va?

translation.en: -[Sam] I'm in Venezuela. -Sure you are.
[Kylie] I'm doing that eyebrow thing right now, BTdubs.
translation.it: Sto facendo quella roba con le sopracciglia.

translation.en: I'm telling the truth.
Uh... I've been abducted. Twice.
Oh, you are so method. I love it.
translation.it: Sei davvero nella parte. Mi piace.

translation.en: Can't wait to find out what the Ghost does.
translation.it: Non vedo l'ora di scoprire cosa farà il Fantasma.

translation.en: Oh, got to go. That's me. I'm Curtis.
translation.it: Devo andare. Sono io. Sono Curtis.

translation.en: Nothing, I--
-I got nothing. -No.
I need to hear about a large sum of money.
translation.it: Devo sentire di una grossa somma di denaro.

translation.en: Or your face is going to be nothing
translation.it: O la tua faccia si disintegrerà

translation.en: -in three, two, one-- -No. Come on, please. No, no, no.
translation.it: - fra tre, due, uno... - No. Andiamo, per favore.

translation.en: -Let's light this candle. -[detective] Whoa, what are you doing?
-What was that? -I didn't-- I don't know.
translation.it: - Cos'è stato? - Non... Non lo so.

translation.en: -[Sam] Ow! That hurt. Oh, that hurt. -This is going to hurt more.
translation.it: - Che male. Fa tanto male. - E farà ancora peggio.

translation.en: [Sam] No. No, please, no.
[Sam shouts indistinctly] No!
Get a move on, cupcake.
I'm sorry. Who are you?
I've been trailing those cops for two weeks.
translation.it: Ero sulla scia di quei poliziotti.

translation.en: They're on the payroll for a heroin-smuggling Russian
translation.it: Sono sul libro paga di un trafficante di eroina russo

translation.en: named Anton Masovich.
Who's that?
A heroin-smuggling Russian-- Did you not hear what I said?
translation.it: Un trafficante di eroina russo... Hai sentito cos'ho detto?

translation.en: I'm sorry. Okay, look.
Thank you for saving me.
I don't do this job for thanks.
translation.it: Non faccio questo lavoro per ringraziamenti.

translation.en: That's a good signature line.
Why does El Toro think you can kill the president?
translation.it: Perché El Toro pensa che tu possa uccidere il Presidente?

translation.en: It's just a misunderstanding.
I'm a writer. I create characters.
translation.it: Io sono uno scrittore. Creo personaggi.

translation.en: -This right here is not me. -What's your name?
translation.it: E questo qui, non sono io. Come ti chiami?

translation.en: My name is Sam.
[sighs] I'll tell you what, Sam and cheese.
translation.it: Ti dirò una cosa, Sam salamino.

translation.en: -I'm gonna get you out of this. -Thank God. Thank you very much.
translation.it: - Ti tirerò fuori di qui. - Grazie a Dio. Grazie infinite.

translation.en: You're gonna do me a favor first.
translation.it: Ma prima devi farmi un favore.

translation.en: Anything you need.
-Meet with Masovich. -That's not gonna happen.
translation.it: - Devi incontrare Masovich. - Non se ne parla.

translation.en: Your friends there told Masovich that you would be at his place in 15.

translation.en: If you don't show, he's gonna know something's up.

translation.en: What does he want with me?

translation.en: That's what you need to find out, honey baked.

translation.en: [whispers] Honey baked?
It's that one with the huge gate.

translation.en: I'm not going in there. The one with the guards?

translation.en: Is that a Doberman? They've got Dobermans walking around, no.
translation.it: È un Doberman, quello? Hanno Doberman lì dentro, no.

translation.en: I'm not gonna be buried in Venezuela. I'm not going in.

translation.en: If I go in, I will be murdered in the face.
translation.it: Se entro lì dentro, mi spappoleranno la faccia.

translation.en: Look at me.
-Breathe. -I'm breathing.
Not like you're drowning.
Slow it down.
Breathe.
If Masovich wanted you dead,
translation.it: Se Masovich ti avesse voluto morto,

translation.en: he would have ordered those cops to execute you.
translation.it: avrebbe detto ai poliziotti di giustiziarti.

translation.en: He didn't. They were going off-script
translation.it: Non l'ha fatto. Non seguivano un copione

translation.en: when they started shaking you down for money.
translation.it: quando hanno iniziato ad arruffarti per i soldi.

translation.en: Find out Masovich's interest in El Toro and the president,
translation.it: Scopri cosa vuole Masovich da El Toro e dal Presidente,

translation.en: and I'll get you home safely.
translation.it: e ti riporto sano e salvo a casa.

translation.en: Masovich needs to believe you are an assassin.
translation.it: Masovich deve credere che tu sia un assassino.

translation.en: Oh, I'm so gonna die. I'm so gonna die.
-[man speaking Spanish over intercom] -[in Spanish] Detective Garcia sent me.
I'm Anton Masovich.
Come outside.
It's a beautiful day.
How about a nice cold Zima?
translation.it: Ti va una bella Zima fresca?

translation.en: You like?
They are fun girls, huh?
Yeah, I can tell by all the splashing.
translation.it: Già, lo capisco da tutti quegli schizzi.

translation.en: When this is over, you can have whichever one you like.
translation.it: Quando avremo finito, potrai avere quella che vuoi.

translation.en: What do you mean, when this is over?
[Anton on microphone] Take a seat.
How are you connected to El Toro?
translation.it: Che collegamento hai con El Toro?

translation.en: The truth.
El Toro wants me to kill the president.
translation.it: El Toro vuole che uccida il Presidente.

translation.en: He thinks I'm an international assassin.
translation.it: Crede che io sia un assassino internazionale.

translation.en: -And? Are you? -No. Not even close.
translation.it: E? Lo sei davvero? No. Nemmeno un po'.

translation.en: [Paolo] I'm sorry, Mr. Masovich.
The Zima shipment was delayed.
translation.it: La spedizione di Zima è stata ritardata.

translation.en: I've brought you Smirnoff Ice.
translation.it: Le ho portato una Smirnoff Ice.

translation.en: [Anton] Don't worry about it, Paolo.
Why they only sell Zima in Japan is beyond me.
translation.it: Perché vendano la Zima solo in Giappone è un mistero, per me.

translation.en: Am I right?
You are. I mean, I just-- I totally agree.
I mean, if you wanna be global, you've gotta be accessible.
translation.it: Se si vuole essere globali, bisogna essere accessibili.

translation.en: You gotta be, you know, you gotta be able to reach out, Paolo.
translation.it: Si deve raggiungere il pubblico, Paolo.

translation.en: I'm blessed to be kept swimming, most of the time.
translation.it: Ho la fortuna di restare a galla, il più delle volte.

translation.en: El Toro is a terrorist who's brainwashed his followers.
translation.it: El Toro è un terrorista che ha indottrinato i suoi seguaci.

translation.en: He's a major concern to my business interests in this country.
translation.it: È una grossa preoccupazione per i miei interessi in questo paese.

translation.en: I've tried to flip his men in the past, but they'd rather die on the sword.
translation.it: Ho provato a comprare i suoi uomini, ma preferirebbero morire di spada.

translation.en: What about you?
-What about me? -Do you wanna die on the sword?
translation.it: - E io cosa? - Vuoi morire di spada anche tu?

translation.en: No, no, no.
I don't want to die on the sword, or, like, on anything else.
translation.it: Io non voglio morire di spada, o di nient'altro.

translation.en: -I don't-- -Wonderful.
Then you kill him for me.
I'm sorry, what?
Kill El Toro.
He trusts you,
-so, you can get close to him. -Yeah, but I'm not an assassin.
translation.it: - così lo puoi avvicinare. - Ma io non sono un assassino.

translation.en: So you keep saying. But you clearly have the skills.
translation.it: Continui a dirlo... Ma chiaramente hai i numeri.

translation.en: You disabled Detective Garcia, and you came here.
translation.it: Hai messo il Detective Garcia fuori uso, e sei venuto qui.

translation.en: Which suggests to me that you are sure of yourself.
translation.it: Il che mi suggerisce che sei sicuro di te stesso.

translation.en: I promise, I'm not sure of myself. When they ask paper or plastic,
translation.it: Non sono sicuro di me stesso. Se mi chiedono "carta o plastica",

translation.en: I'm even like, "Whatever's easiest for you," you know?
translation.it: dico: "Cos'è più semplice per lei", sa?

translation.en: -[speaking Spanish] ¿No habla inglés? -Yeah, your modesty doesn't fool me.
translation.it: Sì, la tua modestia non m'inganna.

translation.en: I'll give you a choice.
You can use your unique position for evil
translation.it: Puoi usare la tua posizione unica per il male,

translation.en: by killing the president, starting a war, and bringing this country to its knees...
translation.it: uccidendo il Presidente, iniziando una guerra, facendo inginocchiare il paese...

translation.en: or you use it for good.
translation.it: o la puoi usare per il bene.

translation.en: For me.
-By killing El Toro. -[in English] I just wanna go home.
translation.it: - Uccidendo El Toro. - Voglio solo andare a casa.

translation.en: -How is everything, Mr. Masovich? -It's great.
translation.it: - Come vanno le cose, signor Masovich? - Fantastico.

translation.en: Paolo here has known me since I was five years old. Isn't that right?
translation.it: Paolo qui mi conosce da quando avevo 5 anni. Non è vero?

translation.en: It has been my pleasure to serve you and to watch you grow into a strong man.
translation.it: È stato un mio piacere servirla e vederla diventare un uomo forte.

translation.en: My father hired him when we came to this country almost 40 years ago.
translation.it: Mio padre lo ha assunto quando siamo arrivati in questo paese quasi 40 anni fa.

translation.en: Wow, that is so nice.
But he should have restocked the Zima.
translation.it: Ma avrebbe dovuto rifornirmi di Zima.

translation.en: I can find you in a second.
Don't let me down like Paolo.
[agent] Oh, you're not gonna believe this.
-Is that Masovich's place? -You know what this means?
translation.it: È la villa di Masovich? Sai cosa significa?

translation.en: -Double down on our bet? -Well, yeah.
But also, if he's met with two of the three kings of Caracas,
translation.it: Ma anche che, se ha incontrato due dei tre re di Caracas,

translation.en: we should probably tell the third.
And I should probably download his book.
translation.it: E io dovrei scaricare il suo libro.

translation.en: You forget about me, bacon bits?
translation.it: Ti sei dimenticato di me, pancetta?

translation.en: So, Masovich must have had a chat with you
translation.it: Masovich deve aver chiacchierato con te

translation.en: and said you could leave the country. No strings attached.
translation.it: e ha detto che puoi lasciare il paese. Senza vincoli.

translation.en: -Yeah, maybe one string. -Yeah, I know.
translation.it: - Forse un vincolo c'è. - Sì, lo so.

translation.en: -I heard the whole thing. -Yeah? Well, I'm getting out of here.
translation.it: - Ho sentito tutto. - Sì? Io me ne vado di qui.

translation.en: I just saw a man get murdered, actually, in the face.
translation.it: Ho appena visto un uomo venire ucciso, in faccia.

translation.en: -So, I'm going to the embassy. -Go ahead.
I promise you, you go in there, you will die.
translation.it: Come entri lì dentro, sei morto.

translation.en: The guy's got eyes everywhere.
Even here.
[Rosa] He wants you to kill El Toro.
translation.it: Vuole che tu uccida El Toro.

translation.en: This is good.
But this is insane.
I'm not an assassin. Now I've got two contracts. Two.
translation.it: Io non sono un assassino. E ho due contratti. Due.

translation.en: How is this good?
Because it confirms Anton Masovich is protecting the president.
translation.it: Perché ci conferma che Anton Masovich sta proteggendo il Presidente.

translation.en: All I have to do is prove it. And then I can have them both extradited.
translation.it: Devo solo dimostrarlo. E poi posso farli estradare entrambi.

translation.en: The president's all about the high life,
translation.it: Il Presidente adora la vita lussuosa,

translation.en: which Masovich is obviously financing with his drug business.
translation.it: che Masovich finanzia con i suoi affari di spaccio.

translation.en: Look, if El Toro wants you to take out--
translation.it: Se El Toro vuole che tu uccida...

translation.en: Take out the president, why don't you help him do it?
translation.it: Uccida il Presidente, perché non lo aiuti a farlo?

translation.en: Because, McRib, my job is to uphold the law, not break it.
translation.it: Big Mac, il mio lavoro è far rispettare la legge, non infrangerla.

translation.en: Do me a favor. Can you stop with the names?
translation.it: Fammi un favore. Puoi piantarla con i nomignoli?

translation.en: Sorry, I didn't know you were that sensitive.
translation.it: Scusa, non pensavo fossi così sensibile.

translation.en: Yes. I am sensitive.
To dying. I'm different that way. My mother would be like,
translation.it: Alla morte. Sono diverso, in quel senso. Mia madre direbbe:

translation.en: "Why are you scared of death?" I don't know. I guess I'm allergic.
translation.it: "Perché hai paura della morte?" Non so. Sarò allergico.

translation.en: It turns out I'm allergic. I'm allergic to death.
translation.it: Sì, sono allergico. Sono allergico alla morte.

translation.en: I understand. This is a scary place.
translation.it: Capisco. Questo è un posto che fa paura.

translation.en: But if you wanna make it home alive, you've gotta get out of your head,
translation.it: Ma se vuoi tornare a casa vivo, devi smetterla di pensare così

translation.en: and get in the game.
[in Spanish] He is here.
This guy has the attention of El Toro and Masovich?
translation.it: Questo tizio è sul radar di El Toro e di Masovich?

translation.en: Well, it seems that way, Mike.
Cut that Mike shit right now, slick.
translation.it: Non cazzeggiare e non chiamarmi Mike.

translation.en: It's either my real name or el presidente.
translation.it: O usi il mio vero nome, o El Presidente.

translation.en: Relax, Miguel.
We all know you grew up in San Diego.
translation.it: Sappiamo tutti che sei cresciuto a San Diego.

translation.en: Maybe Masovich and El Toro believe this guy actually is legit.
translation.it: Forse Masovich ed El Toro credono che questo tizio sia autentico.

translation.en: -Well, is he? -No.
-Look at him. -[Cueto] Mm-hm.
Well, we don't know that for certain.
[Ruiz] I will interrogate this Sam Larson.
It is, after all, a matter of national security.
translation.it: Dopo tutto, è una questione di sicurezza nazionale.

translation.en: Sí, sí. Have General Ruiz talk to him.
translation.it: Si. Fatelo parlare con il Generale Ruiz.

translation.en: Fine. But don't make any other moves.
translation.it: Bene. Ma non fate nessun'altra mossa.

translation.en: We've all worked way too hard to maintain the balance of power in this dump.
translation.it: Abbiamo lavorato sodo per mantenere un equilibrio di potere in questa fogna.

translation.en: Dump?
Yeah. Dump.
Come on, Mike. You hate this place as much as we do.
translation.it: Mike, tu detesti questo posto tanto quanto noi.

translation.en: I know, I know. But do you have to keep reminding me?
translation.it: Lo so. Ma dovete continuare a ricordarmelo?

translation.en: Yes.
This is the address to my safe house.
translation.it: Questo è l'indirizzo della mia casa di sicurezza.

translation.en: -I'll pick you up tomorrow. -Tomorrow?
Don't even think about going out. Masovich owns half the cops,
translation.it: Non uscire. Masovich possiede metà dei poliziotti

translation.en: and controls the airport.
You can't risk being seen.
Yeah, but you've got backup, right?
I'm a one-woman operation.
I gotta believe the U.S. government knew what was happening--
translation.it: Devo sapere che il governo U.S. sappia cosa sta succedendo...

translation.en: CIA wants to maintain the status quo. Nothing more.
translation.it: La CIA vuole mantenere lo status quo. Niente di più.

translation.en: I learned my first year down here that if I wanna do any good,
translation.it: Ho imparato il primo anno qui che se voglio fare qualcosa di buono,

translation.en: I have to do it myself.
Sounds kind of lonely.
[Juan] Don't worry.
It's on me.
Your gun. Now.
You're coming with me, Ghost.
-Juan, I'm sorry about locking you out. -Move.
translation.it: - Juan, mi spiace di averti chiuso fuori. - Muoviti.

translation.en: What if I don't?
-I said move. -Already moving.
[Rosa] Let's go.
I don't like to fight women.
translation.it: Non mi piace lottare con una donna.

translation.en: I can see why.
Get in the game!
You and I aren't done yet.
translation.it: Io e te non abbiamo ancora finito.

translation.en: Looks like we are.
You follow us and you die.
-You're not gonna kill her. -I'm a freedom fighter, not a murderer.
translation.it: Non la ucciderai? Sono un combattente della libertà, non un assassino.

translation.en: But you said you'd murder me.
translation.it: Ma hai detto che avresti ucciso me.

translation.en: For you, I will make an exception.
[agent] Let Mike and General Ruiz know they just left Café Luna.
translation.it: Comunichiamo a Mike e al Generale Ruiz che hanno lasciato il Cafe Luna.

translation.en: -Cleveland, look alive. Come on, man. -Sorry.
You know the Ghost was hired by the Brits in '88
translation.it: Sapevi che il Fantasma fu assoldato dagli inglesi nell'88

translation.en: to take out the leader of that last coup?
translation.it: per eliminare il leader dell'ultimo colpo di stato?

translation.en: General Sanchez?
Actually, I didn't.
But I guess that makes sense. MI5 definitely wanted him gone.
translation.it: Ma ha senso. MI5 decisamente lo voleva morto.

translation.en: Well, either this guy had some crazy contacts...
translation.it: O questo tizio ha delle conoscenze assurde...

translation.en: or he might actually be the real deal.
translation.it: o è davvero chi dice di non essere.

translation.en: Just call General Ruiz.
Where are we going?
Back to El Toro's.
But I didn't have a chance to kill the president.
translation.it: Ma non ho avuto l'occasione di uccidere il Presidente.

translation.en: We both know you won't.
-That's not true. -It is.
translation.it: - Non è vero. - Sì che lo è.

translation.en: You are a man of words, not of action.
translation.it: Tu sei un uomo di parole e non di azione.

translation.en: I punched you.
-You punch like a small child. -It hurt you.
translation.it: - Picchi come un bambino piccolo. - Ti ho fatto male.

translation.en: -It tickled. -No, no, no. I'm sorry, I saw your eyes,
translation.it: - Era un solletico. - Ti ho visto gli occhi,

translation.en: they got all glassy, like you were about to cry.
translation.it: erano umidi, come se stessi per piangere.

translation.en: -[in Spanish accent] "Like a small child." -I'll spank you like a small child.
translation.it: - "Come un bambino piccolo". - Ti sculaccio come un bambino piccolo.

translation.en: [in normal voice] Oh, yeah? Why don't you try, and see what the Ghost does?
translation.it: Oh, sì? Perché non ci provi, e scopri cosa fa il Fantasma?

translation.en: -You are not the Ghost. -Really?
translation.it: - Tu non sei il Fantasma. - Davvero?

translation.en: Where's your gun?
Like I said, all words.
Oh... Maybe I am the Ghost--
God! Really?
Oh, man.
Now it is your eyes that are glassy.
translation.it: Ora sono i tuoi occhi a essere umidi.

translation.en: What is it?
-[Juan] The army. -The army's bad?
When you're a rebel trying to overthrow the government,
translation.it: Se sei un ribelle che cerca di rovesciare il governo,

translation.en: it doesn't get much worse.
-Come on. -All right.
-[Juan] We wait here till night falls. -But that's your truck across the street.
translation.it: - Aspettiamo qui che cali la notte. - Ma è il tuo furgone, là in strada.

translation.en: If they see us, they'll shoot us.
They find us here, they'll shoot us here. We gotta go to the truck.
translation.it: Se ci trovano, ci sparano. Dobbiamo raggiungere il furgone.

translation.en: -Not a good idea. -Come on, Juan.
translation.it: - Non è una buona idea. - Dai!

translation.en: -Get out of your head, get in the game. -Hey!
translation.it: Non pensare così, mettiti in gioco.

translation.en: -El baño, can I--? -[shushes]
[in English] Don't talk.
What is your involvement...
with El Toro...
and Anton Masovich?
[in English] Masovich wants me to kill El Toro. El Toro,
translation.it: Masovich vuole che uccida El Toro. El Toro

translation.en: he wants me to kill the president.
Confusing, right? It's--
I wasn't gonna do it, by the way. I would never--
I wasn't gonna kill the president.
-It took El Toro long enough. -Excuse me?
translation.it: - C'è voluto parecchio, per El Toro. - Chiedo scusa?

translation.en: El Toro has been turning the people against the president for years.
translation.it: El Toro mette la gente contro il Presidente da anni.

translation.en: Let me guess.
He wanted you to do it at the inauguration ball.
translation.it: Voleva che tu lo facessi al ballo inaugurale.

translation.en: Yes.
-So cliché. [chuckles] -I thought so, too.
-It felt a little on the nose, you know? -Listen.
translation.it: - Sembrava detto lì per lì. - Ascolta.

translation.en: Mason, Ghost, whatever your name is.
-Sam. My name is Sam. -Sam.
I had a tiny cat named Sam.
translation.it: Avevo un mini gatto di nome Sam.

translation.en: That would be a kitten.
-In the States, we call it a kitten. -Kitten.
Thank you.
Listen, Sam.
Forget all those offers.
The president needs you to help him take out Masovich.
translation.it: Il Presidente ha bisogno del tuo aiuto per eliminare Masovich.

translation.en: Masovich? I would have thought... El Toro-- I'm just lost.
translation.it: Masovich? Avrei detto El Toro... Sono totalmente perso.

translation.en: I'm just--
If El Toro needs you, then he clearly can't get to the president on his own.
translation.it: Se El Toro ha bisogno di te, non può arrivare al Presidente da solo.

translation.en: Masovich, on the other hand, has had his claws in the president for years.
translation.it: Masovich, d'altra parte, sono anni che ha le grinfie sul Presidente.

translation.en: The longer the president appeases Masovich,
translation.it: Più il Presidente tiene Masovich calmo,

translation.en: the greater the chance that he will be exposed and disgraced.
translation.it: più è probabile che verrà esposto e screditato.

translation.en: Yeah. [sighs]
I just wanna go home.
translation.it: Io vorrei solo andare a casa.

translation.en: And I will get you home, if you do this.
translation.it: E io ti manderò a casa, se lo farai.

translation.en: Will you kill Masovich?
I really don't want to, so...
Then you will be tried and executed
for plotting to assassinate the president of Venezuela.
translation.it: per aver complottato l'assassinio del Presidente del Venezuela.

translation.en: I'll do it, though, I mean...
I'm happy to hear that.
What is your plan?
I'll do it at the inauguration.
Really? Same place you were going to kill the president?
translation.it: Lo stesso posto dove avresti ucciso il Presidente?

translation.en: If everybody thinks I'm gonna kill the president,
translation.it: Se tutti pensano che ucciderò il Presidente,

translation.en: no one will suspect my actual objective.
translation.it: nessuno sospetterà il mio vero obiettivo.

translation.en: And with Masovich's bodyguards all outside during the party,
translation.it: E con le guardie di Masovich tutte fuori durante il party,

translation.en: -he will be at his most vulnerable. -Are you sure it will work?
translation.it: - sarà vulnerabile come non mai. - Sicuro che funzionerà?

translation.en: Already did. Islamabad, '02.
Afghan arms dealer never made it home from the state dinner.
translation.it: I trafficanti afghani non sono tornati a casa dalla cena di stato.

translation.en: -[Ruiz] I like how you think. -He's talking about Chapter 12.
translation.it: - Mi piace come pensi. - Parla del Capitolo 12.

translation.en: Why would an actual assassin write a book about being an assassin?
translation.it: Perché un vero assassino scriverebbe un libro sull'essere un assassino?

translation.en: -It's beyond stupid. -Or is it so beyond stupid it's brilliant?
translation.it: È oltre lo stupido. O è così oltre lo stupido da essere brillante?

translation.en: No, it's just stupid. That's it.
translation.it: No, è solo stupido. Tutto qua.

translation.en: Look, I'm taking this guy off the board, all right?
translation.it: Mi sbarazzo di questo tipo, ok?

translation.en: -I'm gonna go get the C-4. -Oh, don't start with the C-4.
translation.it: - Vado a prendere il C-4. - Non incominciare con il C-4.

translation.en: We can't kill an American.
translation.it: Non si può uccidere un americano.

translation.en: not directly.
[Anton] Traitor!
He is an international assassin.
Of course he's gonna go with the highest bidder.
translation.it: È ovvio che vada con il miglior offerente.

translation.en: And right now, that's General Ruiz.
translation.it: E al momento, è il Generale Ruiz.

translation.en: You really should read his book.
I want every cop in the city looking for that pig.
translation.it: Voglio che ogni poliziotto in città cerchi quel maiale.

translation.en: And when they find him,
I want him to die a long, painful death.
translation.it: voglio che muoia una lunga e dolorosa morte.

translation.en: -Understood. -[Anton] And tell Paolo
to bring me another Zima and clean this up.
translation.it: di portarmi un'altra Zima e pulire.

translation.en: You killed Paolo, jefe.
What the hell, Anton?
You can't just shoot someone in front of us.
translation.it: Non puoi uccidere qualcuno davanti a noi.

translation.en: At least wait until we leave.
translation.it: Almeno aspetta che ce ne andiamo.

translation.en: Damn!
All right. Whole night's ruined.
[agent] That's just--
-Something is wrong with you. -[agent] I know.
translation.it: - Hai qualcosa che non va. - Lo so.

translation.en: -[Cleveland] In the head. -[agent] It's not even...
translation.it: - Nella testa. - Non è... Non temere.

translation.en: How did you get here? Did anyone spot you?

translation.en: Well, why don't you take a look at me,
and then take a look at everybody else who lives here?
translation.it: e poi guarda gli altri che vivono qui.

translation.en: I'm gonna say, yeah, I think I was spotted.
translation.it: Direi di sì, mi hanno visto.

translation.en: [Sam] Here you go.
I could've done that myself.
I opened it for you. It's not a big thing.

translation.en: Five years of my life.
It looks a lot like my place.
Yeah, except the stuff on my walls is real.
translation.it: Ma la roba sul mio muro è vera.

translation.en: Yeah? How's this for real?
translation.it: Sì? Senti qui, a proposito di vero:

translation.it: ho incontrato il consigliere numero uno del Presidente.

translation.en: -General Ruiz? -Mm-hm.
-How did you get a meeting with him? -How I get most of my meetings here.
translation.it: - Come hai fatto a incontrarlo? - Come con quasi tutti gli altri.

translation.en: I was abducted.
Guess who he wants me to eliminate at the inauguration ball.

translation.en: [whispers] Masovich.
-Bingo-vich. -[Rosa chuckles]
[Sam] So, I gotta ask, why are you so obsessed with taking down Masovich?
translation.it: Devo chiedertelo, perché sei così ossessionata dal prendere Masovich?

translation.en: The country would be a lot better off with him behind bars and...

translation.en: -President Cueto out of power. -I mean, why you?
translation.it: - E se il Presidente Cueto fosse deposto. - Ma perché tu?

translation.en: Because my parents grew up here.

translation.en: Because the DEA assumed I'd fail.
translation.it: La DEA pensava che avrei fallito.

translation.en: And honestly, because if I don't do it...

translation.en: -who will? -It just--
It just seems so dangerous, you know? You're down here by yourself and--

translation.en: Is it really worth risking your life?

translation.en: We're all gonna die.
Not all of us get to make a difference.

translation.en: to ordering the hit on Masovich,
translation.it: che ha ordinato di uccidere Masovich,

translation.en: I could probably get them to turn against each other.

translation.en: Maybe get one of them to flip.

translation.en: You're definitely gonna get yourself killed.
[Rosa] I'm not talking about me.
You.
Tomorrow night at the inauguration, wearing a wire.

translation.en: -Oh, no, no, no. -This could be your chance
to start making a difference.

translation.en: I promise...
I won't let anything happen to you.

[Sam] I got shot! I got shot!
What about not letting anything happen to me? I'm dying. I'm dying.

translation.en: -You're not dying. Shut up! -You shut--
-Ever been shot before? -Yeah, twice.

translation.en: Yeah, I got shot square. Okay, I'm definitely dying.
translation.it: Sì, mi hanno preso in pieno. Ok, sto decisamente morendo.

translation.en: I can't feel my thumb.
-What the hell? -Go!
[Rosa] Come on.
Let's go.
[Rosa] Hurry up!
Come on. I've got a go-bag at the mission.

translation.en: So, let me guess.
The hero from your book used that trick with the lamp.

translation.en: Well, no.
The last actuary table I ran was on home electrical fires.

translation.en: So, we can thank Trent's d-pic. [chuckles]

translation.en: That sounds very, very weird.
Um... 'Cause you don't know Trent. And it's weird on its own.

translation.en: [stammers] Wouldn't a hospital be better?
Can't go to a hospital. [sighs]
You don't get it, do you?
Those guys were cops.
Masovich owns this city.
I wasn't joking when I said the DEA wrote me off.

translation.en: I've been down here on my own forever.

translation.en: I don't have any more resources. That was my last safe house.

translation.en: Well, then, how would I be getting to the inauguration?
What are you talking about?
I'll do it.
I'll wear a wire.
No, you were right. It's too dangerous. We gotta get you out of here.

translation.en: -Mission's over. -Mission is not over.

translation.en: -The Ghost doesn't just walk away. -You are not the Ghost.
translation.it: - Il Fantasma non si arrende. - Non sei il Fantasma.

translation.en: You said, "Get out of your head and get in the game."
translation.it: Hai detto: "Smettila di pensare così e mettiti in gioco".

translation.en: Sam, we almost died tonight.
We're all gonna die.
Not all of us get to make a difference.
translation.it: Ma non tutti riusciamo a cambiare le cose.

translation.en: We'd need a small army to protect us while we got ready.

translation.en: I think I know where to find one.
Tell El Toro the Ghost is here.
translation.it: Dì a El Toro che il Fantasma è qui.

translation.en: It is the Ghost.
The one and only.
And you, who is this?
DEA, idealist, patriot.
She's a badass. She's a big fan of yours, too.
translation.it: È una picchiaduro. Ed è anche una tua grande fan.

translation.en: -You know? Yeah. -Seems very nice.
[groans] My shoulder, man! I got shot.
[in English] I have thousands of followers all over Venezuela,

translation.en: but I cannot think of anybody as beautiful as you.
translation.it: ma nessuno è bello come te.

translation.en: Yes. Muy bonita, we get it. Okay. Let's focus on what's important.
translation.it: Muy bonita, abbiamo capito. Concentriamoci su cose importanti.

translation.en: Yours truly just received a personal invite to...

translation.en: a certain black-tie event.
You see? What did I tell you?
That's right, Juan.
The plan is in motion.
Tomorrow I'll be in position to take out el presidente.
translation.it: Domani sarò in posizione per eliminare el Presidente.

translation.en: But there is one catch.
-Anton Masovich is trying to kill us. -The Russian Moby?
translation.it: - Anton Masovich cerca di ucciderci. - La mafia russa?

translation.en: -Yeah. -Screw him.
If you want me to take out the president, I need your men to keep us alive.
translation.it: Se vuoi che elimini il Presidente, i tuoi uomini devono proteggerci.

translation.en: -Anything for you, friend. -Yeah.
-Anything. -All right.
Anything for you. Come.
We got our small army.
Let's get you ready for the ball, Cinderella.
translation.it: Ora, prepariamoti per il ballo, Cenerentola.

translation.en: No one's gonna be able to bring a weapon into the palace, so...
translation.it: Nessuno potrà portare un'arma nel palazzo,

translation.en: if you can steal one of these from the presidential guard, use it.
translation.it: e se riesci a rubarne una alle guardie Presidenziali, usala.

translation.en: Let's see.
-You're a good shot. -I've spent time at the range.
translation.it: - Spari bene. - Sono stato al poligono di tiro.

translation.en: Don't get me wrong.
You're good, but you're not as good as me.
translation.it: Sei bravo, ma non tanto quanto me.

translation.en: -Oh, really? -Yeah, really.
Why don't you try this on?
Okay, that's really cool.
-But not practical. -No, you could use that in the field.
translation.it: - Ma per niente pratico. - No, lo puoi usare sul campo.

translation.en: -Bullshit. -I used it in my book.
translation.it: - Stronzate. - L'ho usato nel mio libro.

translation.en: -Sam, what we're about to do is-- -I know.
translation.it: - Sam, quello che stiamo per fare è... - Lo so.

translation.en: -It's not a book. -Let's just call it a night.
translation.it: - Non è un libro. - Chiudiamola qui per stanotte.

translation.en: Wait a second.
-You're worried about me. -No.
Yeah.
That's why you're a one-woman operation.
Why you push people away with the nicknames.
translation.it: Perché allontani la gente con quei nomignoli.

translation.en: If you're on your own, you don't have to worry about losing anyone.
translation.it: Se sei da sola, non devi preoccuparti di perdere nessuno.

translation.en: You can't get hurt.
How did you know?
I'm a writer.
I notice the details.
It was just really hard when my first partner died.
translation.it: È stata durissima quando è morto il mio primo partner.

translation.en: I'm really sorry.
Then I lost two more in just one year.
translation.it: Poi ne ho persi altri due nello stesso anno.

translation.en: Three?
Three of them died?
I mean, three here.
But before that, I lost two while I was on assignment in Mexico.
translation.it: Prima, ne ho persi due durante una missione in Messico.

translation.en: [stammers] Five of your partners, they're dead? Five of them?
translation.it: Cinque dei tuoi partner sono morti? Cinque?

translation.en: They call me the jinx back in D.C. No one will work with me.
translation.it: A D.C. mi chiamano la iella. Nessuno vuole lavorare con me.

translation.en: -Come on, don't cry. -Everyone who touches me dies.
translation.it: - Andiamo, non piangere. - Chiunque mi tocca, muore.

translation.en: You're messing with me, aren't you?
translation.it: Mi stai prendendo in giro, vero?

translation.en: Thought you noticed the details.
[sighs] You are good.
Hell, yeah, I am. Pack this up.
translation.it: Diavolo, se lo sono. Raccatta tutto.

translation.en: Let's go.
[in Spanish] As requested.
Turns out she's been trying to bring down Masovich for years.
translation.it: Pare che siano anni che lei prova ad abbattere Masovich.

translation.en: [in English] My kind of gal.
[man] They disappeared into the jungle.
Two of our men tried to follow them, but they were gunned down.
translation.it: Due dei nostri li hanno seguiti, ma gli hanno sparato.

translation.en: I pay you a lot of money, and you have failed me again.
translation.it: Vi pago un sacco di soldi, e mi avete deluso di nuovo.

translation.en: Next time I see the Ghost and that DEA bitch...
translation.it: La prossima volta che vedo il Fantasma e quella baldracca della DEA...

translation.en: I'm gonna kill 'em myself.
-Thank you. -[El Toro speaking Spanish] De nada.
[in English] Let's get a move on, cupcake.
From my private collection.
Listen, I know you don't need the luck.
translation.it: So che non vi occorre fortuna.

translation.en: But I will say break a leg.
translation.it: Ma vi dirò in bocca al lupo.

translation.en: The president's leg.
Then, his other leg.
translation.it: Poi, che lo morda di nuovo.

translation.en: And then, carefully but painfully, rip out his still beating heart,
translation.it: Poi, lentamente ma dolorosamente, strappategli il cuore ancora pulsante,

translation.en: and hoist it above his corpse like this for the entire party to see.
translation.it: e innalzatelo sopra al suo cadavere cosicché lo vedano tutti gli invitati.

translation.en: I was thinking something maybe quicker.
translation.it: Pensavo a qualcosa di più rapido.

translation.en: Whatever works for you.
Until next we meet.
I can do that myself.
I opened it for you. It's not a big thing.
translation.it: L'ho aperta per te. Non è una grande impresa.

translation.en: Stay close to them.
Let me know when it is done.
Tonight... we take back our country.
translation.it: Stasera... Ci riprendiamo il nostro paese.

translation.en: It's my country.
Isn't El Toro gonna be pissed when I don't do what I said?
translation.it: El Toro si arrabbierà quando non farò cosa gli ho detto?

translation.en: Once the president's prosecuted, his corruption's exposed,
translation.it: Quando la corruzione del Presidente verrà esposta

translation.en: El Toro will thank you.
Testing, testing. Uno, dos, tres.
[Rosa on recording] Testing, testing. Uno, dos, tres.
Remember, I need the president confessing to ordering the hit on Masovich.
translation.it: Il Presidente deve confessare di aver ordinato di uccidere Masovich.

translation.en: -Is that all? -Don't get killed.
-Like my other five partners. -You were messing with me.
translation.it: - Come i miei cinque partner. - Mi hai preso in giro.

translation.en: Was I?
Don't you start with that.
You go left, I'll go right.
translation.it: Tu vai a sinistra, io a destra.

translation.en: Locate the president, and meet back here before you make contact.
translation.it: Troviamo il Presidente, e torniamo qui prima che tu faccia contatto.

translation.en: I trust all is proceeding to plan.
translation.it: Ho fiducia che il piano si svolga come previsto.

translation.en: Tomorrow our Russian friend won't be feeling very good.
translation.it: Domani il nostro amico russo non si sentirà molto bene.

translation.en: Because he'll be dead.
That's what I was going for, yeah.
So clumsy of me.
I think I've had one too many.
translation.it: Ne ho bevuto uno di troppo.

translation.en: Thank you, my friend.
Let's dance.
I thought you'd never ask.
translation.it: Credevo non me l'avresti mai chiesto.

translation.en: Thank you.
[Juan] I'll take that, sir.
How did you get in?
-I'm more capable than El Toro thinks. -I'm glad you're here, man.
translation.it: - Sono più abile di quanto pensi El Toro. - Sono lieto che tu sia qui.
